review: I recommend Dr. L Sunandhini, from Aster Prime Hospital..., me and my mom are seeing her since 12 years she is very polite and listens to the patients problems and help them recovery well very and fast. Her way of treating patients is very good, she sees the root cause through some minimal blood works and then prescribes the medicines. You will not be on many medicines, trust me she very professional from her end.

We will like her treatment.she will explain the position and give medicines very calm and polite  she is very good doctor and good human being 
FM y Nirmalkumar  and krishnakumari  both are getting treatment from her

context: Respiratory tract infection,kidney and gall bladder stones,Typhoid fever,
review:
Hope the physician, treatment and hospital facilities are more better than  neelima hospital near by surroundings need to know more and want to give feedback after full health. Thanks from 
G.Jayamani patient's son in law.

needs to be little more professional .yesterday appointment was at 10.20. got to meet her around 11.15. again today was absent and we have to travel and come back without any consultation . hospital should inform patient upfront if Dr is on leave.my wife has stomach ach, she had treated her without touching the area of pain and given 4 test. * ** *** **** ** **** *** *********not a good experience overall

****** ********* *** *** I am satisfied with doctor treatment. There was not much waiting time for doctor and doctor behaviour was good and listened to our problem properly and I would like to recommend this doctor to my family and friends.
Yes she is very friendly doctor.She listens to our problem carefully and provides proper medication.
